plot: A troubled alien girl from another planet escapes to Earth in hopes of finding peace. She soon realizes her pursuers will not stop until they bring her in, despite the fact that she shares a strong bond with one of them.
title: A Song for Swan
plot_es: A troubled alien girl from another planet escapes to Earth in hopes of finding peace. She soon realizes her pursuers will not stop until they bring her in, despite the fact that she shares a strong bond with one of them.
